about_the_game:
MuGen - Music Generator


Create original, royalty free music in seconds with MuGen!

Discover the ultimate tool for music creation. Whether you need a unique track for your next game, YouTube video, or simply want to unleash your creativity, MuGen is your solution.

Welcome to MuGen, a music generator designed to save you time and effort. Stop struggling with melody and chord progressions – let MuGen's create unique compositions for you in seconds.

With a few simple clicks, choose your preferred style, genre, and instruments, and watch as MuGen generates a professional-quality track tailored to your specifications. No musical experience required! Transform your music-making process from painstaking editing to effortless curation.

Our music generator is not only fast but also highly customizable. Fine-tune your tracks or use them as a springboard for your own compositions. Experience the power of guided randomization grounded in real-world music theory used by professionals.

MuGen produces music in the industry-standard MIDI format, compatible with nearly all music software, including DAWs. This allows for easy refinement, real instrument additions, and advanced mixing and mastering.

Features

  • Unlimited albums and songs per album
  • Immediate playback with real-time note visualization
  • Portable MIDI format for easy import into other programs
  • Extensive customization options: key, tempo, chord lengths, and more
  • Supports various scales and modes: Major, Minor, Dorian, Phrygian, Lydian, Mixolydian, Locrian
  • Customizable sections: verse, chorus, bridge, and solo with key progression changes
  • Versatile song types: POP, EDM, movie themes, and more
  • Flexible song structures: verse/chorus, verse/chorus/bridge, build-up, etc.
  • Detailed song parameters for tone, sound, feel, and mood customization
  • Instrument and drum randomization or selection
  • Single track creation and export
  • Chord-based or scale-based melodies
  • Advanced chord options: Sus2, Sus4, Add9, 7th chords, inversions, embellishments
  • FX and PAD tracks for EDM styles
  • And much more!

Stop wasting time and let MuGen take care of the tedious parts of music creation. Let MuGen's engine inspire and assist you. Try MuGen today and witness the magic of effortless music generation!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows ALL
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: MuGen uses guided randomization and music theory to create royalty free music based on your input parameters. Get inspired, unleash your creativity - generate music for your next game or video, create backing tracks for your guitar practice - the possibilities are limitless!
